content.text: Match ends, Villarreal 3, Granada CF 1.
Second Half ends, Villarreal 3, Granada CF 1.
Attempt missed. Cani (Villarreal) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Borja Valero.
Corner,  Villarreal. Conceded by Mikel Rico.
Corner,  Villarreal. Conceded by Júlio César.

Foul by Carlos Marchena (Villarreal).

Attempt missed. Borja Valero (Villarreal) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left from a direct free kick.
